entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@mmpadellan @TeaPainUSA About 8% of U.S. population get the flu each year.
2,275,645 COVID cases = 0.69% of pop
119,923 COVID deaths = 0.04% of pop

AS IN 0%!

WHAT HONEST PERSON would claim deaths of 0.04% of population, mostly fragile compromised elderly, is a PANDEMIC??

#COVID__19 #COVID19
